sentences.sContent: After exposing several infamous "monopolies" as either chimerical or the product of government privilege, Paterson turns her attention to the putative remedy for monopoly.
sentences.sContent_eng: After exposing several infamous "monopolies" as either chimerical or the product of government privilege, Paterson turns her attention to the putative remedy for monopoly.
sentences.sCn: 在揭露一些臭名昭著的垄断其实质或者是空想，或者是政府特权的产物后，帕特森把注意力转向了公认对垄断的补救措施上。

remMethod.val: 很多化学 (chemical) 物质是他空想的 (chimerical)

words.tran: [遗] 嵌合体；虚构的怪物；妄想
